What we do:
  • Recommend computer solutions that will work for your business 
  • Design, develop, implement and maintain your business information architecture 
  • Give you ideas on how to take advantage of exciting new technology 

Want help creating, transforming, publishing, or just preserving your digital content?


We specialize in systems constructed using open standards, shareware and public domain solutions - so you can avoid a "supplier stranglehold", and preserve information through technological shift.  Alternative software technologies that we support include:

  • Linux/GNU operating systems and tools 
  • Java applications 
  • Internet and intranet web applications. 
  • Shareware 
  • PGP information security 

We also can integrate these technologies with the standard commercial offerings, giving you the best of both worlds.

We work with you to understand your business - and implement the solutions that will give your business the competitive edge.

Software combined with optimized internal and external processes can be a business differentiator.

INFORMATION IN YOUR LIFE
Rapidly evolving computer technology is providing tools to help to take advantage of your ideas in exciting new ways. 

  • Run existing processes more efficiently by replacing cumbersome, tedious processes with fast, easy  and cost-effective modern solutions. 
  • Improve controls and understanding by taking better advantage of your information. 
  • Create entirely opportunties. 

HOW DOES CAÑONES SOFTWARE OUTFITTER HELP?
We guide you through the wilderness of competing technologies, recommending and implementing sustainable information handling techniques. We have extensive experience outfitting both large and small businesses with information capture, organization, access and analysis tools.  We create and integrate solutions that are appropriate to the needs and under the control of you.

CAÑONES SOFTWARE OUTFITTER

Northern New Mexico’s system integrator and information technology services provider.


Cañones Software Outfitter
has the objectivity, creativity, experience and commitment to get you in touch with the Information Age.

The “One Size Fits All” mentality no longer makes good business sense

OBJECTIVITY

We are not affiliated with any commercial computer hardware or software manufacturer, and use “public domain” solutions whenever possible.  You get what will economically work for you, and not what some one else wants to sell. 

CREATIVITY

Great diversity of cutting edge experience combined with sound technical principles, appreciation of elegance and attention to detail allow us to create new  methods for understanding and manipulating your business information. 

EXPERIENCE

Our people have proven track records for producing quality technical results on time.  Our teams are composed of individuals from diverse and complimentary backgrounds, each of which is a carefully chosen expert in their specialization. 

COMMITMENT

We are a Northern New Mexico business.  Our solutions work for you now, and as your needs change we’re around to help your information architecture continue to grow and evolve as your business does.

AT FEES YOU CAN AFFORD

Cañones Software Outfitter operates with low overheads unlike those “Big 6” consulting firms.  Our low overheads mean more professional Information Age results for your information technology investment.

Our Focus

Our company doesn't maintain flashy office space or a fleet of corporate jets. Our company does offer cost effective technical guidance on a shoestring budget.

We work with you to:

Give you ideas on how to take advantage of new technology

Provide written critiques of existing systems and/or development

Part 1

The domain object model is the most important layer in the system. This layer contains the business logic of the system, and thus, the true implementation of the use cases. The domain model is the collection of nouns in the system, implemented as POJOs. These nouns, such as User, Address, and ShoppingCart, contain both state ( first name, last name) and behavior

Part 2

The domain object model is the most important layer in the system. This layer contains the business logic of the system, and thus, the true implementation of the use cases. The domain model is the collection of nouns in the system, implemented as POJOs. These nouns, such as User, Address, and ShoppingCart, contain both state ( first name, last name) and behavior.
